name: RUPTURE (Aphelion Games)
description:
AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD AND IN BROWSER!

Blast through hordes of enemies and defend your corporation's assets! RUPTURE is a top-down shooter in the heart of cyberspace. As a netrunner for your company, you must protect your data from rivals who want to see it gone. Using weapons and ammo you scavenge from your fallen foes, defend your data servers for as long as you can and don't let your data pool reach zero. If you do, you're out of a job - game over.

CONTROLS

WASD - Walk

Mouse - Look/Aim

Mouse 1 - Shoot

Left Shift - Movement Ability (Speed Boost)

Q - Defensive Ability (Turret)

F - Offensive Ability (EMP Grenade)

ESC - Pause

This prototype represents a vertical slice of the final product. Over time, more features, weapons, abilities, and polish will be added to the game. My dev partner Justin (@j.ellis.design on Instagram) and I have tons of exciting plans for this game. For now, enjoy this taste of what we have in store for you.

The music tracks used in game are "Synthwave D" and "Memory Allocation", provided by TeknoAXE on YouTube.

All code, sound effects, and 3D assets are the creations and property of myself (C M Badiuk) and Justin Ellis (@j.ellis.design), collectively known as Aphelion Games. All rights reserved.
